basics.name: Xiang Li
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full-stack developer with a passion for building scalable and efficient applications.

projects.name: High-Performance Distributed RPC Framework
projects.summary: Built a distributed RPC framework with Netty, supporting multiple serialization algorithms and load-balancing strategies.
highlights: Handled 2000+ requests per second with custom load balancing.

projects.name: SaaS Genomics Annotation Service - Uchicago Globus Lab
projects.summary: Developed a cloud-based genomics annotation platform on AWS with real-time notifications and dynamic scaling.
highlights: Automated data transitions with AWS S3 and Glacier, integrated Google login with OAuth 2.0.

publications.name: Time-series Analysis of Predictions on Emergency Department Visits (Submitted)
Study on the Optimization of Emergency Medical Staff Regional Dispatch
